creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: lighthouse at center, battered by the waves of a violent sea; ship on each side of lighthouse, swaying in waves
marks: Signature, Title monogram in plate, upper right: [JC No. 72]; title
medium: Etching and drypoint on chine appliqué
provenance: John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Eddystone Lighthouse
